SourceProxy.name: CircuitReader
SourceProxy.label: BlueConfig circuit reader

Documentation.short_help: Read the BlueConfig file to obtain a circuit.
Documentation.long_help: Read the BlueConfig file to obtain a circuit.

SourceProxy.Documentation: This reader constructs circuits by reading targets from a BLueConfig and generating the meshes for each morphology.

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.label: BlueConfig FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the BlueConfig file.

IntVectorProperty.name: SILUpdateStamp
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Information property indicating the update stamp of the SIL. Every time the SIL is rebuild, this time stamp is changed.

IntVectorProperty.name: MeshType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose between the full mesh, or a skeleton of the Morphology

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateNormalVectors
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, normal vectors are calculated for each mesh vertex

IntVectorProperty.name: Random
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When MaximumNumberOfNeurons is set, this flag controls how the N loaded neurons are found, either at random, or sequentially

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfNeurons
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When nonzero, only a subset of neurons up to a count of N will be loaded to save time/memory
